items.title: Standard Plan
items.description: 24 hours of promotion across all channels
features: Pinned promotional post for the entire campaign duration
Unlimited text length
Photos, videos, buttons, and links — no limits
Custom ad creative based on your materials
Support for UTM tags and link tracking
Priority placement at the top of the channel
No 'sponsored' label on your post
Option for exclusive placement (no competitors)
Basic statistics on reach and engagement
24/7 technical support
Discounts for long-term campaigns

items.title: Premium Package
items.description: 1 week of promotion across all channels
features: All features from the Standard Plan
Promotional text under each post
Ability to update your ad during the campaign
Up to 3 bot-based mass mailings from our network
Advanced media formats: GIFs, carousels, interactive buttons
Detailed analytics on clicks and engagement
Dedicated account manager throughout the campaign
Retargeting to active audience for higher response

items.title: Elite Promotion
items.description: 1 month of promotion across all channels
features: All features from the Premium Package
Up to 10 bot-based mass mailings with guaranteed reach
Promotional text under each post during entire campaign
Custom promotion strategy tailored to your project
Branded element integration (logo, brand style)
Extended support and creative optimization assistance
